summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Lots 5 and 6, Block 17, Wood's Supplemental Plat of Blocks 16 and 17, Burke's 2nd Addition; and Lot 13, Block 5, Pleasant Valley Addition; with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-289 and 17-235, respectively.
